layout.singingstanza: Un -- to Thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul, Un -- to Thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul. Oh my God, I trust in Thee, Let me not be a -- shamed, Let not mine en -- e -- mies tri -- umph o -- ver me.

lyrics.stanza: Unto Thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul, Unto Thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.
Oh my God, I trust in Thee, Let me not be ashamed, Let not mine enemies triumph over me.
Yea, let none that wait on Thee be ashamed, Yea, let none that wait on Thee be ashamed
Show me Thy ways, teach me Thy paths, Show me Thy ways, teach me Thy paths
Remember not the sins of my youth, Remember not the sins of my youth
All the paths of the Lord are mercy and truth, All the paths of the Lord are mercy and truth
What man is he that feareth the Lord? What man is he that feareth the Lord?
The secret of the Lord is with them that fear Him, The secret of the Lord is with them that fear Him
Turn Thee unto me and have mercy upon me, Turn Thee unto me and have mercy upon me
O keep my soul and deliver me, O keep my soul and deliver me
Let integrity and uprightness preserve me, Let integrity and uprightness preserve me
Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles, Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles
